1.title: Genealogy and Birth
1.keyEvent: Genealogy of Jesus and His birth foretold

2.title: Visit of the Magi
2.keyEvent: Wise men visit Jesus; flight to Egypt

3.title: John the Baptist
3.keyEvent: John baptizes and prepares the way

4.title: Temptation of Jesus
4.keyEvent: Jesus tempted in wilderness; begins ministry

6.title: Teaching on Piety
6.keyEvent: Instructions on giving, prayer, and fasting

7.title: Judgment and Prayer
7.keyEvent: Teachings on judging others and the Lord’s Prayer

8.title: Miracles of Healing
8.keyEvent: Jesus heals many and calms the storm

9.title: Calling of Matthew
9.keyEvent: Jesus calls Matthew; heals and teaches

10.title: Mission of the Twelve
10.keyEvent: Jesus sends disciples to preach and heal

11.title: John’s Inquiry
11.keyEvent: Jesus praises John and denounces unrepentance

12.title: Lord of the Sabbath
12.keyEvent: Jesus defends Sabbath healing and confronts Pharisees

14.title: Feeding Five Thousand
14.keyEvent: Jesus feeds crowd and walks on water

15.title: Traditions and Faith
15.keyEvent: Jesus challenges traditions and heals Gentiles

17.title: Transfiguration
17.keyEvent: Jesus transfigured; heals a demon-possessed boy

18.title: Teaching on Humility
18.keyEvent: Jesus teaches about humility and forgiveness

19.title: Marriage and Riches
19.keyEvent: Teachings on marriage, divorce, and wealth

21.title: Triumphal Entry
21.keyEvent: Jesus enters Jerusalem; cleanses the temple

22.title: Parables and Questions
22.keyEvent: Jesus answers questions and teaches parables

23.title: Woes to Pharisees
23.keyEvent: Jesus condemns hypocrisy of religious leaders

24.title: End Times Prophecy
24.keyEvent: Jesus predicts destruction and second coming

25.title: Parables of Judgment
25.keyEvent: Parables on readiness for kingdom judgment

27.title: Crucifixion
27.keyEvent: Jesus is tried, crucified, and buried
